articles.description: The former Coronation Street actress enjoyed the day ice-skating in the city's west end with her three children - Matilda, Delilah and one-year-old Charlie.
articles.content:
Helen Flanagan is enjoying a trip to Scotland as she treats her children to an afternoon ice skating at Elfingrove.
